name: Miku'n Pop
storyline: A mysterious force has turned many local Animals & Vocaloids insane & violent! Join Miku, Rin, & Luka, as they fight their way to stop the cause of this chaos!
summary: This game is stylized like an action platformer game from 80's - 90's. Your objective is to defeat all enemies on the screen. Each character has their own different play styles. Featuring 2 difficulty modes; Hard Mode & Easy Mode. There are 9 stages, & for each 10 levels, you will encounter a boss.
